remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdleme0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme0.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme0.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme0ex1N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> E. u e. A ( u .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ u .<_ W ) ) $.
$d .<_ u $.
$d .\/ u $.
$d A u $.
$d P u $.
$d Q u $.
$d U u $.
$d W u $.
